Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Requirements Matching Strategy Align based on order_id and event timing Tolerance less than 2 seconds Semantic matching of event names Merging Combine attributes Non-matching events Keep separate

Name: Validation - PE

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Sequence Log A Validate to Payment Log B Validate to Payment Timing difference 5 seconds exceeds 2s Alternative View Log B Payment gateway delay explains offset Log A received time Log B actual

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Gap 5 seconds exceeds less than 2s heuristic Strict adherence keep separate Prompt If cannot confidently match leave separate Decision keep separate

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Revisiting the Payment Event Gap 5s Strict rule less than 2s No match sequence 3rd event names align but timestamp gap exceeds tolerance Log B delay note suggesting distinct moments treat as separate events

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
